segments.text: I need some flowers for my girlfriend .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No problem . Would you like some artificial carnations ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , no . Carnations are not very elegant.Artificial flowers have no passion .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: How much did you want to spend ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Our most elegant flower is Golden Lily .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Do you want to add some baby â€™ s breath for that ? They are equally popular now .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Of course . Can I have it delivered to my girlfriend's house this afternoon ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , but there is a five dollars delivery charge .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That's ok . Here is the address .
segments.speaker: S1
